description:
Are you a someone looking to get started in the video production world but don't know how?  Does it seem confusing and overwhelming?

In today's online world, video content is king.  Just look all around you.  On every social media platform there are videos being posted to entertain, to connect, and most definitely to promote.  They range from short videos less than 10 seconds long, to highly polished 5+ minute videos.  Wouldn't it be great to know that you're capable of making these too? If you're a brand, and looking to get into the video production world, this course will get you started.  Knowing how to make your own videos for your brand, company, or just a personal hobby is a skill that's invaluable.  

This course will help teach you the basics of video production so you can start making your own video content as soon as possible.

Topics you will learn:

  • Types of video production
  • Cameras to get you started
  • Basic video tips and techniques
  • How to edit with iMovie

How the course is taught: 

  • How-to and explanation videos
  • Lecture-style slides
  • Computer screen recordings
  • White board drawings
  • Lesson notes and project PDFs

 At the end of the course you'll make four of your own short videos that you can start adding to your portfolio/reel.

This is a course for beginners and it's structured in a way so that the student feels comfortable and doesn't feel overwhelmed with confusing terminology and techniques.

I hope to see you in the course!
title: How To Make Videos: Video Production Basics From Scratch
